email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The starting freight rate we’re quoting is in the low 50s ($50.50 per metric ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider a rate in the high 40s? Also, could you confirm the laycan dates? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concerns about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer a revised rate of $49.75 per metric ton. The laycan is currently set for October 20-25. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised rate. $49.75 sounds reasonable. However, we’d need the laycan to be tightened to October 22-24 to align with our schedule. Also, could you confirm the demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, we can adjust the laycan to October 22-24 as requested. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this is acceptable, and we can proceed with the fixture. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, the laycan and demurrage terms are acceptable. Let’s proceed with the fixture at $49.75 per metric ton. Please send over the recap for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Fixture Recap - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, as discussed, please find the fixture recap attached. Summary: Vessel MV Ocean Star, DWT 150,000, LOA 280m, cargo size 140,000 MT crude oil, load port Houston, discharge port Rotterdam, laycan October 22-24, freight rate $49.75/MT, demurrage $20,000/day. Let me know if everything looks good. Best, Sarah
